results.description: Combine hedge fund ownership (high userCount) with recent idiosyncratic return to identify overcrowded winners that revert. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two fields; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field used); SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage=1.0); SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing high userCount fields. Confidence set to 0.72.

Tilt momentum by sentiment: buy stocks with positive momentum but higher sentiment. S1 used two fields; S2 not applied; S3 not applied (coverage high); S4 applied (sentiment has large userCount). Confidence 0.78.
Normalize momentum by market cap to prefer smaller-cap momentum (size-adjusted). S1 used two fields; S4 used high userCount for momentum. No ts_backfill needed. Confidence 0.65.
